title: Plotting Multiple Datasets
description: Matplotlib is a popular data visualization library in Python. In this lab, you will learn how to plot multiple datasets using a single call to the plot function in Matplotlib.

meta.title: Plotting Multiple Datasets in Python
meta.description: Learn how to plot multiple datasets using Matplotlib in Python.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, datasets, data visualization, plotting
